Package com.bumptech.glide.request

Interface Summary
FutureTarget<R> An interface for an object that is both a Target and a Future.
Request A request that loads a resource for an Target.
RequestCoordinator An interface for coordinating multiple requests with the same Target.
RequestListener<T,R> A class for monitoring the status of a request while images load.
ResourceCallback A callback that listens for when a resource load completes successfully or fails due to an exception.
 

Class Summary
GenericRequest<A,T,Z,R> A Request that loads a Resource into a given Target.
RequestFutureTarget<T,R> A Future implementation for Glide that can be used to load resources in a blocking manner on background threads.
ThumbnailRequestCoordinator A coordinator that coordinates two individual Requests that load a small thumbnail version of an image and the full size version of the image at the same time.
